item.title: ntfy
item.description: /c/ntfy on discuss.ntfy.sh https://discuss.ntfy.sh/c/ntfy Description ntfy (pronounced _notify_) is a simple HTTP-based pub-sub notification service. You can use it to send push notifications to your phone via HTTP PUT/POST. [ntfy website](https://ntfy.sh/) â€¢ [Documentation](https://ntfy.sh/docs) â€¢ [GitHub](https://github.com/binwiederhier/ntfy) â€¢ [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.heckel.ntfy) â€¢ [F-Droid](https://f-droid.org/en/packages/io.heckel.ntfy/) â€¢ [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/cT7ECsZj9w) â€¢ [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ntfy/id1625396347) â€¢ [Matrix](https://matrix.to/#/#ntfy-space:matrix.org) If you'd like to **become a sponsor**, I would be humbled to accept your donation via [GitHub Sponsors](https://github.com/sponsors/binwiederhier) or [Liberapay](https://en.liberapay.com/ntfy/) ðŸ’¸ðŸ’°.
